captions.text:
MALE SPEAKER: Hey,
welcome back to

So YouTube turns eight
years old today.

MALE SPEAKER: And we asked the
Gregory Brothers to recap the

Our company has the best
vacation policy.

CARL: Yeah, I just feel
so refreshed and

The world has changed
a lot since 2005.
I had a laptop before I moved.

Did this one come
with wireless?

MALE SPEAKER: This isn't
about laptops, Carl.

MALE SPEAKER: I'm talking
about YouTube, Carl.

[MUSIC - THE GREGORY BROTHERS,
"THE HISTORY OF YOUTUBE"]

MALE SPEAKER: Um, could you
guys keep it down in here?

You've been singing for five
years, and there's some others
who'd like to use this room.

I got to go to a
meeting, guys.

title: The History of YouTube by The Gregory Brothers (YouTube Comedy Week)
